GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object of a given user ID

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of an article with a given article ID

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/article_id.description: updates a given article by ID with the number of votes specified and returns an object with the updated article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments with given article_id

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

articles.author: butter_bridge
articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates the number of votes for a given comment and returns an object with the updated comment

comment.author: butter_bridge
comment.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the given comment specified in comment_id
